titleStmt.title: A watch for a wise-mans observation.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.I. for Samuel Rand dwelling at Holborne-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Two poems: "One God there is, of Wisedome, Glory, Might,"; "O Earth, of Earth, observe this well".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 29. 1649"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
